globalHeaders.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; img-src 'self' data: https: https://raw.githubusercontent.com; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; font-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self' https://pokeapi.co https://*.pokeapi.co; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'; frame-ancestors 'none'; form-action 'self'; upgrade-insecure-requests
